create_table_sql.table: CREATE TABLE comment_list(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,time TEXT,comment_author_name TEXT,comment_author_url TEXT,comment_note TEXT,comment_content TEXT,md5 TEXT,comment_index TEXT)

CREATE TABLE qiushi_list( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,author_name TEXT,author_img TEXT,img TEXT,content TEXT,comment_count TEXT,agree_count TEXT,dis_agree_count TEXT,time TEXT,comment_url TEXT,type TEXT,note TEXT,md5 TEXT,author_url TEXT,is_agreed INTEGER DEFAULT(0), is_dis_agreed INTEGER DEFAULT(0))
